question: What is the uptime for PixelServers?
answer: We pride ourselves on maintaining a 99.9% uptime for all our Minecraft servers, ensuring your game is always accessible.

question: Do you offer refunds?
answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.

question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade your plan at any time, and the changes will be applied immediately.

question: Do you support custom plugins and mods?
answer: Yes, all our plans support custom plugins and mods. We also offer one-click installs for popular modpacks.

question: How do I get support if I have issues?
answer: We offer 24/7 support through our ticketing system and live chat for all customers.
